title: had a good night
body:
spent my night having a barbecue, then a chat around an out-door fire, talked for a bit, had some soft-drink, then played a couple rounds of darts.
pretty good night, nice way to spend a friday.
might play darts with the lads more often.

how are you lot doing?

replies.body:
Its been too long charlie
That sounded like a nice way to spend a Friday if I must say so myself
I spent my Friday playing league a bit, and eating chicken.
not that exciting :|
Good to have you back

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wE7xAUeF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-06T13:30:14.880+0000)
>
> Its been too long charlie
> That sounded like a nice way to spend a Friday if I must say so myself
> I spent my Friday playing league a bit, and eating chicken.
> not that exciting :|
> Good to have you back

well my memory is bird%%%% so youll have to remind me where I met you haha, but yeah its nice to see a friendly face.

ps: chicken is great, no regrets on that

And i was like,

Can't sleep.

Better play League.
